name: hts-db
tagline: Mongodb & Python system for storing, analyzing and visualizing high-throughput screening (HTS) data
body:
###Introduction
The hts-db is a simple but powerful system for storing and analyzing chemical-bioactivity assay data. The backend is a [mongodb](http://www.mongodb.com) NoSQL database with a python [mongoengine](http://mongoengine.org) object-oriented interface. All data analysis and visualization is handled in python using [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org), numpy, scipy and matplotlib.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
